name: Lighty (Théo FORAY)
description:
There are many closed doors in this dark dungeon. What are they hiding and how can they be opened? The light is surely the key but be careful not to sink into the darkness. 

_____________________________________________________

Lighty is a game made for the Global Game Jam 2022 on the theme `Duality` with the help of one people. It was developed in Unreal 4.27 with c++. I took care of the development of all the gameplay mechanics in c++ and blueprint, the integration of the assets in unreal.

Objectif:
Solve the puzzles to open the doors and try to find the secret of this dungeon. Use your 3 orbs of light to interact with the dungeon but when they are all used, you won't be able to see where you are. Think carefully there must be a solution!  

Inputs: 
Use WASD or ZQSD to move.
Use the mouse to move the cursor.
Use left mouse button to send an orb to the cursor position.
Use the right mouse button to retrieve the orb closest to the cursor position.
Use R to retrieve all orbs simultaneously.
